name: The Kind Mermaid
description:
You are a mermaid, and you have to prevent the ships from sinking.

Developped in 4 hours for gamejam 210.

 Controller recommanded. Space Bar or A button  to sing and disctract the ships.

Save as many boats as you can before crashing 5.

Unfortuntaley we did not had time to add sounds :(

Developer's best : 1700
